title: Explore: Beads vs work gap analysis
description:
# Beads-to-Work Gap Analysis

## Verdict

| Gap | Decision | Rationale |
|-----|----------|-----------|
| Dependencies (blocked_by/blocks) | **SKIP** | Phase ordering in titles + /implement wave loop already handles this. Formal deps add cycle detection complexity for no gain in a 2-persona system. |
| Design/notes fields | **SKIP** | Description = editable plan, comments = append-only notes. Every skill already uses this pattern correctly. |
| Swarm orchestration in CLI | **SKIP** | Orchestration belongs in the skill layer (/implement), not the data layer (work CLI). Coupling to Claude APIs would break CLI reuse. |
| Parent-child/epics | **DONE** | ParentID, link/unlink, --parent/--roots filters |
| --type flag | **DONE** | feature/bug/chore in config |
| Sync | **N/A** | Filesystem-based, not needed |
| Lint | **N/A** | Removed, not needed |
| Gate/mol templates | **N/A** | Removed entirely |

## What to Build Instead

Small improvements that smooth existing workflows without
model changes:

**Phase 1: Title-based sorting for phase ordering**
1. Add "title" as a sort option in SortIssues()
2. Lets /implement do --sort=title to get Phase 1 before Phase 2
3. Update help text

**Phase 2: Show comments inline**
4. Display comments in work show output (currently JSON-only)
5. Add --comments flag for full comment log
6. One-stop view of plan + notes

**Phase 3: List format improvements**
7. Add --format=short (ID + title only, for piping)
8. Show child count in list output for parent issues
9. Helps scripts parse output reliably

**Phase 4: History filtering by label**
10. Add --label filter to work history command
11. See all events for a group of related issues
12. Useful for post-implementation review
